description:
encoding/xml: return errors from Encoder's underlying Writer

Fixes issue 3773

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
This can be done with less code. A bufio.Writer already keeps track of whether an error has occurred, so just check the result of enc.Flush.

Yeah, atom did that in his version.

On Sun, Jun 24, 2012 at 4:24 PM, <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> This can be done with less code. A bufio.Writer already keeps track of
> whether an error has occurred, so just check the result of enc.Flush.
>
>
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/**6336051/<http://codereview.appspot.com/6336051/>
>

subject: code review 6336051: encoding/xml: return errors from Encoder's underlying Writer
